properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 1 at 6:41AM PST until February 2 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt, shifting
northwest today, and seas 10 to 13 feet at 13 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10
NM and Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60
NM.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 AM PST THIS MORNING
